summary: An aspiring writer is repeatedly gang-raped, humiliated, and left for dead by four men whom she systematically hunts down to seek revenge.
cast: Camille Keaton|Eron Tabor|Richard Pace|Anthony Nichols|Gunter Kleemann|Alexis Magnotti|Tammy Zarchi|Terry Zarchi|Traci Ferrante|William Tasgal|Isaac Agami|Ronit Haviv
title: La violencia del sexo
